desc: CEMLUX is a London Based company providing Concrete finishes for your home. We do Concrete Walls and Floors from Micro-Concrete material. We do Cast Polished Concrete Worktops in almost any size. Our product assortment is not finishing with these, we also have a huge collection of Concrete furniture and Home Decor.

layout.text: POLISHED CONCRETE WORKTOPS, FLOORS, WALLS & HOME DECOR
